title: The Entire Secret Menu at Torchy’s Tacos Revealed

steps.title: Your typical taco, but with a corn and flour tortilla.
steps.content: Your typical taco, but with a corn and flour tortilla. Do you struggle choosing between a flour and corn tortilla? If so, the Green Chile Pork Missionary Style is the answer to your taco troubles! This secret menu item features slow-roasted pork carnitas, pickled onions, jack cheese, cilantro, guacamole, and creamy chipotle sauce—placed on a crisp corn tortilla and then wrapped in a flour tortilla. [1] X Research source 613 calories per taco [2] X Research source Torchy’s Taco Junkie tip: request a side of diablo sauce and drizzle it all over to amp up the spice level.

steps.title: It’s the Trailer Park “trashy” taco with added chorizo.
steps.content: It’s the Trailer Park “trashy” taco with added chorizo. If you’re a fan of Torchy’s Trailer Park taco, listen up! This off-menu item includes fried chicken, spicy chorizo, bacon, green chiles, green chile queso, cheddar jack cheese, pico de gallo, and poblano sauce—perfectly placed on a warm flour tortilla. It might be a little messy, but we promise the flavors are worth it. [3] X Research source 638 calories per taco [4] X Research source

steps.title: A bold breakfast taco with lots of cheese and meat.
steps.content: A bold breakfast taco with lots of cheese and meat. The Ace of Spades is the breakfast taco of your dreams… but even better. Served on 2 flour tortillas, it features a fried egg, cheddar jalapeño sausage, smoked brisket, cheddar jack cheese, cotija cheese, cilantro, sour cream, diablo sauce, and ooey-gooey green chile queso. It’s cheesy, meaty, and a little spicy (a power breakfast if we do say so ourselves). [5] X Research source 973 calories per taco [6] X Research source Torchy’s Taco Junkie tip: if you really want to get crazy, upgrade the green chili queso with hillbilly queso—it has chorizo for even more flavor.

steps.title: A double-decker taco bursting with flavors and textures.
steps.content: A double-decker taco bursting with flavors and textures. Only the true Taco Junkies know about this spicy legend. The Matador is a fan-favorite that features a corn tortilla, layered inside a flour tortilla. It’s filled with chopped brisket, grilled jalapeños, pickled onions, jack cheese, creamy avocado, cilantro, sour cream, and tomatillo sauce—the perfect flavor profile if you’re craving something spicy. [7] X Research source 678 calories per taco [8] X Research source

steps.title: A sizzling shrimp taco, seasoned to perfection.
steps.content: A sizzling shrimp taco, seasoned to perfection. Seafood lovers, this one’s for you! Wrapped inside a flour tortilla, the Naughty Santa features grilled shrimp, chorizo, pickled onions, jack cheese, avocado, cilantro, and poblano sauce. It’s creamy, dreamy, and delicious… What more can you ask for? [9] X Research source 486 calories per taco [10] X Research source Torchy’s Taco Junkie tip: grab a lime wedge from their counter and squeeze it over your taco to bring out the flavors in the shrimp.

steps.title: A scrumptious spin on your seafood taco.
steps.content: A scrumptious spin on your seafood taco. If you’re tired of your usual fish taco, order The Hipster for a unique flavor combination. This taco includes panko-fried tuna, smoky bacon, black beans, cojita cheese, and creamy avocado sauce. Add a squeeze of lime over everything, and you’re good to go! [11] X Research source 389 calories per taco [12] X Research source

steps.title: A flavorful taco filled with your favorite breakfast foods.
steps.content: A flavorful taco filled with your favorite breakfast foods. Eggs, potatoes, cheese… yes, please. The Jack of Clubs is the definition of a hearty breakfast. It includes a fried egg, potatoes, cheddar jack cheese, black beans, cilantro, sour cream, diablo sauce, and crispy corn tortilla strips—served on a warm flour tortilla. It’s your standard breakfast taco done right. [13] X Research source 504 calories per taco [14] X Research source Torchy’s Taco Junkie tip: request some avocado to contrast the fiery diablo sauce (and help cool down your mouth).

steps.title: Crispy fried catfish is the star of this Southern-inspired taco.
steps.content: Crispy fried catfish is the star of this Southern-inspired taco. Step aside, shrimp taco… this fish taco is fiery and flavorful! The Alabama Shake includes cornmeal-crusted catfish, peppadew peppers, cotija cheese, poblano slaw, cilantro, and creamy avocado sauce. It’s cheesy, creamy, crunchy, spicy… everything you want and more. [15] X Research source 263 calories per taco [16] X Research source

steps.title: Your typical beef taco, perfected at Torchy’s.
steps.content: Your typical beef taco, perfected at Torchy’s. If you’re looking for a classic taco, order The Mad Cow to satisfy your cravings. Served on a flour tortilla, it features fajita beef, black beans, corn, cheese, and chipotle sauce—pretty standard, but pretty good. [17] X Research source 653 calories per taco [18] X Research source Torchy’s Taco Junkie tip: ask them to remove the corn, and order a side of street corn—add the street corn to your taco to take it to the next level.
